body_text:
It would be helpful for testing risky changes to existing recipes if we could submit and approve changes to recipes and make them available for testing, but without actually publishing the changes. Currently, changes to existing recipes can only be tested by creating separate recipes to test the changes with.
Perhaps by having a separate API endpoint for staged changes?

title: Ability to stage and test changes to recipes
